title: Czech Republic: Enjoy the Good Life with Citi Life
summary: Prague – Citibank, in cooperation with MasterCard, has announced the launch of Citi Life – a credit card unique to the Czech market that rewards customers with 2 percent back on purchases up to 2,000 CZK monthly. Customers receive the reward in the form of Citi Life Premiums, which are credited to a card holder's Citi Life Premium account. Citi Life Premiums can then be transformed to cash credited to the card holder's card (the minimum redemption is 500 CZK) or used to cover the annual maintenance fee of the card. Unredeemed premiums are transferred to the next month and are valid for the next 36 months from the credit date.
tag-1: Czech Republic: Enjoy the Good Life with Citi Life
tag-3: Prague – Citibank, in cooperation with MasterCard, has announced the launch of Citi Life – a credit card unique to the Czech market that rewards customers with 2 percent back on purchases up to 2,000 CZK monthly. Customers receive the reward in the form of Citi Life Premiums, which are credited to a card holder's Citi Life Premium account. Citi Life Premiums can then be transformed to cash credited to the card holder's card (the minimum redemption is 500 CZK) or used to cover the annual maintenance fee of the card. Unredeemed premiums are transferred to the next month and are valid for the next 36 months from the credit date.
tag-4: "Citi's strategy is to offer products to our customers that make their lives easier and everyday activities such as shopping and paying for services more rewarding. With this in mind, we are pleased to launch the Citi Life card, offering card holders 2 percent back on the value purchases made at merchants throughout the world. Clients can take advantage of the card's benefits both in the Czech Republic and when traveling abroad," said George Denisenko, Consumer Lending Head at Citibank in the Czech Republic.
tag-5: "Worldwide use of the Citi Life credit card and its benefits are enabled by the unique flexible MasterCard platform," said Ivana Lanová, sales manager at MasterCard Europe. "We are pleased about Citibank's decision to offer a second credit card in the Czech Republic on this platform in their portfolio. We believe that Citi CSA MasterCard World, as well as Citi Life MasterCard World, will fulfill the expectations of Citibank clients."
tag-6: Customers can also obtain up to 25-percent discounts on goods and services bought at Citi Club merchant stores. These Citi Club discounts are directly deducted from the total amount that they pay at the point of sale. Citibank cooperates with nearly 100 merchants including restaurants, furniture stores, fitness centers and travel operators within the Citi Club program.
tag-7: "When the reward feature is combined with our exclusive Citi Club offers, customers can greatly benefit from having the Citi Life card in their wallet," commented Katarína Turnová, Proprietary and Benefits Cards Product Manager at Citibank.
tag-8: If the card is used at least once for any purchase within 30 days from approval of the application, the client automatically gets extra Citi Life Premiums in the amount of 250 CZK. Moreover, if the card is used at least once in each billing cycle, card holders get their monthly maintenance fee of 50 CZK reversed for the first 12 months. Like other Citi credit cards, Citi Life offers up to 55 days grace period and allows customers to choose their own PIN code free of charge. A customer can also obtain up to four supplementary cards – which feature a dynamic, stylish design – free of charge that also offer the 2-percent reward on purchases.
tag-9: More information on the Citi Life credit card is available at www.citikarta.cz, through Citiphone service line 800 088 088 or at Citibank stands in selected shopping centers.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
